Chapter 15.15:37: That is how things turned out for Nicanor. The city of Jerusalem remained in the possession of the Jewish people from that time on, so I will end my story here.

Chapter 15.15:38: If it is well written and to the point, I am pleased; if it is poorly written and uninteresting, I have still done my best.
